Trade/Device Name(s): Audit™M MicroCVTM Cardiac Markers Linearity Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Audit™M MicroCVTM Cardiac Markers Linearity Set, a five-level human serum-based cardiac marker quality control for calibration verification.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as an assayed quality control material of five human serum levels containing CKMB, Myoglobin, and Troponin I for use with quantitative assays to verify calibration, linearity, and reportable range.
